module.description: The registered module that emitted this particular event.

name.description: Name of the reward. It can used to identify the type of the event.

data.description: The data contained within the emitted event. This varies based on the `module` and `name` properties.

topics.description: The list of topic that the data is related to within the emitted event. The number and order of the topics vary based on the `module` and `name` properties.

index.description: Index of this particular event within the list of events in the block.

id.description:
Unique identifier of the block.
Derived from the block signature.

height.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

timestamp.description: UNIX Timestamp indicating the time of block generation.
